body: We are looking for an Android Developer who possesses a passion for pushing mobile technologies to the limits and will work with our team of talented engineers to design and build the next generation of messaging application.Responsibilities:    Full-stack Android Software Development.    Produce well designed and well tested production quality code.    Integrate with back-end web services    Accountable for complete development process; design, development, testing, and deployment.    Pick best technology for situation.  The ability to tell the difference between cool and useful.    Work on bug fixing and improving application performance.     2+ years development experience in Android development, solid knowledge of Android OS.    Passionate about pixel perfect UI and Design.    Working knowledge of the socket programming in android platform.    Familiarity with Restful APIs to connect Android applications to services.    Understanding of development best practices and standards and mobile development life cycle.    Strong understanding of AGILE and SCRUM methodologies.    Excellent problem solving, critical thinking and communication skills.    Familiarity with mobile security concepts and best practices a plus.    Solid grounding in VCS such as GIT.    A BS or MS in Computer Science or related field
title: Android Developer - Remote Working
